page.title: 12Shopping in: FINTRY
page.content: {Village shop-plus-Post Office. Open most days. Apart from groceries, it offers everything from newspapers to camera film and cards to ice cream. Suppliers are both local and distant, some call daily. {Garden shop with fancy goods, calor {gas depot, carriers and tearoom.} Some confectionery and picture framing are also available. It's fun to try and find what isn't there. The shop supplies five local gas dealers. {A Greengrocers and travelling van.} The shop sells basic goods, and picnic provisions for tourists. The van goes to local villages and outlying areas. {A hairdresser's as annexe to a farm.} This serves adults and children. There's no need to go to town. { {All these businesses are family run in {a flexible way with local help. }
